name: Window Breaker
description:
Throw rocks at windows, collect splinters to acquire upgrades to make you get more score and unlock new things to throw at!

This goofy little game was made for Mini Jam 121 with the theme of reflections and windows. There are plenty of windows for sure. As for the reflect part, well, reflect on the nature of vandalism or something.

Window Breaker features cameos from some indie hit games, I would always be happy to add more if I feel like updating the game in the future.
